show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: We Have Reached The Coffin Corner

title: We Have Reached The Coffin Corner
content:
First of all, a comparison between the way things were just before the First World War and now. <!--more--> The parallels are striking and scary.
The definition and causes of ‘slowing growth’.
We are moving towards ‘the coffin corner’ (pictured here) where the economic availability of the economy is simply insufficient to service the debt.
That, right there, is the endgame.
Global M&A volume is slowing sharply.
This will cause further massive waves of layoffs to come.
Listen to Elizabeth Warren  destroy the credibility of Janet Yellen in Congress.
Donald Trump’s view of the economy.
Yet more evidence of a slowing worldwide economy.
